name: Conrad
description: A mysterious knight who rushes to Celica's aid whenever she is in danger. When he wears his mask, his personality changes entirely. Appears in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia.

dialogue.text: My name is Conrad. Alongside my sister, Anthiese, I will strive for perfection!
I spent my youth in a hidden hamlet, without friends... With so many others here, though, it is never unpleasant.
When my sister, Anthiese, traveled to the Temple of Mila, I followed close behind, always out of sight... My duty is to swoop in and rescue, after all!
You are from another world as well, are you not? Do you miss home? ...No? Then you are tough indeed...
I was hungry, so I made some soup. Shall we enjoy it together? Come, join me, <Player Name>.
Reading heroic tales has been a favorite pastime of mine since I was young... And the library here is full of stories I've never heard of! Just look at all these books I borrowed!
I have come in search of new friends. From what I hear, you are a good one! So says <Friend Name>.
I have grown strong... How delightful!
As expected. Not great...but not so bad either!
Hmph. I see. I gave it my best, but... even that is not always enough...
I will keep training until I am strong enough to protect both you and Anthiese!

When I was a child, I survived an assassination attempt... After that, I lived in hiding. I knew nothing of the world...had no friends... All that kept me going was my dream of reuniting with my sister. Coming here and meeting others who have survived similar hardships has strengthened my resolve even more... I will exact my vengeance on those who made me and Anthiese suffer! Er, well, I would...had Alm not beaten me to it. To the victor goes the glory, I suppose... Heh...

origin: Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows of Valentia
